channel.title: Help this is a weird error!
channel.description:
i was working a super powerminer today, i took a nap,ate dinner,than came back and i tried running it and it said Line 81: [Error] (578:1): Unknown identifier 'BoolToStr' in script F:\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\srl\srl\core\Users.scar
help!

item.title: Help this is a weird error!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Users.scar is trying to run a function known as BoolToStr which changes a boolean value to a string value.

Here is the function that I just rewrote:

function BoolToStr(Bool : Boolean) : String;
begin
  if (Bool) then
    return := 'true'
  else
    return := 'false';
end;

Well, I don’t know what to do. Just try updating your SRL version and it should be fine.

~Ron

Read full topic
item.source: Help this is a weird error!
